item.title: 英格兰银行称企业可能通过裁员提升生产力
item.description: 英国央行正看到久违的生产力复苏迹象，英国企业正通过裁员来消除疫情后积累的过剩劳动力。【原文：The Bank of England is seeing signs of a long-awaited productivity revival as British firms lay off workers, in a “dishoarding“ of excess labor built up after the pandemic.】

item.title: 普利兹克斩获胜利，日本制造商进军芝加哥
item.description: 一家日本高精度机床制造商正将业务拓展至芝加哥，这对寻求连任的伊利诺伊州州长JB·普利兹克而言是一项胜利。【原文：A Japanese manufacturer of high-precision machine tools is expanding its business to Chicago, a win for Illinois Governor JB Pritzker, who is running for a third term.】

item.title: 廉价股票难觅踪影，投资者正撤离美国市场
item.description: 欧洲和日本具有吸引力的股票估值，对寻求美国股市之外投资机会的投资者极具吸引力。但坏消息是：这些低廉的估值正迅速消失。【原文：Attractive equity valuations in Europe and Japan were a big draw for investors looking beyond US stocks. The bad news: Those cheap price tags are fast disappearing.】

item.title: 美国贷款机构希望更像主权财富基金
item.description: 一份致员工的备忘录显示，一家传统上负责海外发展贷款的政府机构正致力于转型为类似主权财富基金的运作模式，这正是唐纳德·特朗普总统的核心目标之一。【原文：A government agency traditionally responsible for development lending abroad aims to be more like a sovereign wealth fund, a key goal of President Donald Trump, according to a memo to staff.】

item.title: 高盛即将进驻瑞信米兰办公室
item.description: 高盛集团即将入驻瑞士信贷集团位于意大利的总部大楼——这座米兰地标性办公楼，彰显了这家美国银行在意大利不断扩大的业务版图。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is set to move into the landmark Milan office that was Credit Suisse Group AG’s headquarters in Italy, underscoring the US bank’s growing footprint in the country.】

item.title: 法国电力价格跌至6月以来最低水平，太阳能发电量激增
item.description: 法国次月电力价格跌至6月以来最低水平，因太阳能发电量激增压低现货价格。【原文：French month-ahead power slid to the lowest since June as a surge in solar generation pushed down spot prices.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚对厄瓜多尔加征30%互惠关税，升级贸易争端
item.description: 哥伦比亚对厄瓜多尔的60余种商品征收30%的对等关税，加剧了两国之间的贸易争端。【原文：Colombia slapped 30% reciprocal tariffs on more than 60 goods from Ecuador, escalating a trade dispute between the two neighboring countries.】

item.title: MAGA登陆欧洲：特朗普特使撕毁外交手册
item.description: 至少比尔·怀特——特朗普派驻布鲁塞尔的大使——在因干涉比利时内政被外交部传唤时，还现身应召。【原文：At least Bill White, Donald Trump’s ambassador to Brussels, showed up when summoned by the foreign ministry over some undiplomatic interventions into Belgian politics.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心指数因就业前景改善而上升
item.description: 美国消费者信心指数在2月份小幅上升，原因是人们对经济前景、收入水平和就业市场持更乐观态度。【原文：US consumer confidence ticked up in February on more upbeat prospects for the economy, incomes and job market.】

item.title: 美国银行关键指标表现向好 尽管利润下滑——联邦存款保险公司称
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司数据显示，尽管整体利润小幅下滑，美国银行在第四季度的关键指标普遍实现增长，基础存款保险基金余额持续攀升。【原文：US banks showed broad gains in key metrics during the fourth quarter despite a modest decline in overall profit, and the bedrock deposit insurance fund’s balance continued to tick higher, according the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.】

item.title: 现代汽车力推氢能运输方案，与加拿大潜艇项目竞标挂钩
item.description: 据韩华海洋公司高管透露，现代汽车公司已提议在加拿大建设氢燃料电池基础设施，作为韩国竞标建造新型潜艇舰队合同的一部分。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co. has proposed building hydrogen fuel-cell infrastructure in Canada as part of South Korea’s bid for a contract to build a new submarine fleet, according to an executive at Hanwha Ocean Co.】

item.title: 标普500指数上涨，交易员评估人工智能驱动的下跌带来的影响
item.description: 周二美股开盘小幅走高，交易员们正评估人工智能"恐慌性抛售"的前景——该抛售潮在前一交易日重创了市场。【原文：US stocks edged higher at the open on Tuesday as traders assessed the outlook for the artificial-intelligence “scare trade” that pummeled the market the prior session.】

item.title: 加拿大在特朗普威胁后批准所有湾流喷气机
item.description: 加拿大航空监管机构已认证了剩余的湾流私人飞机型号，此前美国总统特朗普曾声称加拿大拒绝批准这些型号，并警告将采取关税及其他报复性措施。【原文：Canada’s aviation regulator certified the remaining Gulfstream private jet models that US President Donald Trump said the country had declined to approve, and warned of tariffs and other retaliatory measures.】

item.title: 美国天然气交易清淡中下跌，因天气预报转暖
item.description: 美国天然气期货在清淡交易中下跌，因天气预报显示气温回升，表明供暖和发电厂燃料需求将下降。【原文：US natural gas futures declined in thin trading as weather forecasts shifted warmer, indicating lower demand for the heating and power-plant fuel.】

item.title: 贡沃尔任命高层团队，在托恩奎斯特离职后新增合作伙伴
item.description: 在亿万富翁联合创始人托比约恩·托恩奎斯特去年突然离职后，贡沃集团已组建新的管理委员会并扩大了员工持股计划。【原文：Gunvor Group has established a new management board and expanded its employee ownership following the abrupt departure of billionaire cofounder Torbjörn Törnqvist last year.】

item.title: 人类学链接人工智能代理，配备投资银行与人力资源工具
item.description: 人类中心主义PBC公司正将旗下Claude聊天机器人的应用范围拓展至新领域。此前数周，这家初创企业推出的工具引发市场动荡，这些工具引发了人们对人工智能可能使整个行业过时的担忧。【原文：Anthropic PBC is expanding the reach of its Claude chatbot into new sectors, weeks after the startup sparked a market meltdown with the release of tools that raised questions about AI’s potential to render entire businesses obsolete.】

item.title: 库克称美联储或无力应对人工智能引发的失业问题
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎·库克警告称，美国央行可能无力应对人工智能普及所导致的失业率上升问题。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook warned the US central bank may not be able to counter rising unemployment driven by adoption of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 欧盟拟在匈牙利大选三天后提议禁运俄罗斯石油
item.description: 据彭博社获得的文件显示，欧盟将于4月15日公布一项提案，拟全面禁止俄罗斯石油进口。此举恰逢匈牙利大选后三日——该国是目前仍依赖俄罗斯石油供应的少数国家之一。【原文：The European Union will on April 15 unveil a proposal to ban the remaining imports of Russian oil, just three days after elections in Hungary, one of the last nations still reliant on the supplies, according to a document seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 荷兰养老金改革避免了"断崖效应"，央行表示
item.description: 荷兰央行表示，该国规模达1.6万亿欧元（1.9万亿美元）的养老金体系改革及其投资配置的重大调整正在顺利推进，且未引发金融市场显著波动。【原文：The overhaul of the €1.6 trillion ($1.9 trillion) Dutch pension system and its huge shift in investment allocations is proceeding smoothly without causing substantial volatility in financial markets, according to the country’s central bank.】

item.title: Sonos计划对应用程序进行改版——这次走对了方向
item.description: 索诺斯公司计划在未来数月内通过更新简化其iPhone和安卓应用程序，重点优化导航功能并提升控制操作的便捷性。但鉴于2024年一次失败的应用发布险些导致公司整体动荡，新任首席执行官此次绝不愿冒险。【原文：Sonos Inc. plans to simplify its iPhone and Android app in the coming months with an update that focuses on improved navigation and easier-to-use controls. But after a botched app release in 2024 nearly upended the entire company, Sonos’ new chief executive officer isn't taking any chances this time.】

item.title: Waymo在纽约遭遇挫折后，将在得克萨斯州主要城市亮相
item.description: 字母表公司旗下Waymo将开始在得克萨斯州三大城市提供商业自动驾驶出租车服务，在纽约遭遇挫折后，该公司正积极推进其扩张计划。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Waymo will start offering commercial robotaxi service in the three biggest cities in Texas, pushing ahead with its aggressive expansion plan after a recent setback in New York.】

item.title: 哈佛大学主导的研究表明，人工智能可预测71%的主动型基金交易
item.description: 日复一日，华尔街投资者忧心忡忡，担心人工智能会将人类专家的判断转化为代码，从而颠覆白领行业。【原文：Day after day, Wall Street investors fret that artificial intelligence could disrupt white-collar industries by turning expert human judgment into code.】

item.title: 美银调查显示，"人工智能泡沫"成为信贷领域最大威胁
item.description: 美国银行客户调查显示，"人工智能泡沫"首次成为信贷投资者最担忧的问题。【原文：An ‘AI bubble’ is the biggest concern of credit investors for the first time ever, according to a survey among Bank of America Corp.’s clients.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油海运量微增，弥补管道运输损失
item.description:
海运量增长弥补了输往匈牙利、斯洛伐克的管道运输量损失。【原文：

Increases in seaborne flows make up for lost piped volumes to Hungary, Slovakia

】

item.title: 法国部分股票期货交易因税收调整暴跌
item.description: 去年初法国政府收紧股息税相关规定后，部分法国股票期货交易陷入停滞。该政策此前曾遭到行业代表的批评。【原文：Trading in some French equities futures came to a standstill after the government early last year sharpened rules around dividend taxes that have been criticized by industry representatives.】

item.title: 大豆价格下跌，交易商权衡出口销售与贸易不确定性
item.description: 芝加哥大豆价格自三个月高点进一步回落，因美国农业部数据显示美国大豆出口需求疲软，且市场担忧贸易不确定性。【原文：Soybeans nudged further down from a three-month high in Chicago, as US Department of Agriculture data signaled weaker demand for American exports and the market weighed trade uncertainty.】

item.title: Verition公司签约引进艾斯勒技术，对冲基金宣告关闭
item.description: 维瑞顿基金管理公司正签署协议，将获得一项技术平台的授权许可。该平台曾为对冲基金艾斯勒资本提供交易情报支持，而该基金目前正处于清盘阶段。【原文：Verition Fund Management is signing a deal to license a technology platform that drove trading intelligence at Eisler Capital, a hedge fund that’s winding down.】

item.title: 美敦力糖尿病业务MiniMed寻求在美国IPO募资7.84亿美元
item.description: 糖尿病管理公司MiniMed集团公司即将从医疗巨头美敦力公司剥离独立，该公司计划通过首次公开募股筹集高达7.84亿美元资金。【原文：MiniMed Group Inc., a diabetes management firm that will be separated from health-care giant Medtronic Plc, is seeking to raise as much as $784 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 阿布扎比王室支持的医疗公司试探信贷投资者
item.description: 一家由阿布扎比王室支持的中东医疗服务提供商正首次寻求从国际固定收益投资者处筹集资金。【原文：A Middle East healthcare provider backed by Abu Dhabi royalty is looking to raise cash from international fixed-income investors for the first time.】

item.title: 为何杰米·戴蒙对信贷市场的疑虑有充分依据
item.description: 随着流动性提供者日益被流动性需求者取代，公司债券面临急剧下跌的风险。【原文：Corporate bonds are exposed to abrupt downside as liquidity providers are increasingly replaced by liquidity takers.】
